data.title: Mexican
data.text: It's ok... It's comfortable and clean, the food is fairly priced, the service is mostly ok, and the food is bland unless you salsa it up.

data.title: Good Mexican Food
data.text: We stayed one night at the Thunderbird Lodge in Redding, and needed dinner so went to La Cabana, which literally shares a parking lot with Thunderbird.  We are from Arizona and know what we like in Mexican food, and were pleasantly surprised by how good La Cabana's food was.  I ordered the cheese enchilada with green sauce, with rice and beans--very good.  The chips and salsa were very good also.

data.title: Best I've had in years
data.text: I am originally from Texas so I know good Mexican food. Get the carne esada taco dinner. The past 4 years I have lived in Portland, Oregon and no good Mexican food there so far so it was great to have some for a change. It's also walking distance from the Thunderbird Lodge.

data.title: Surprisingly good
data.text:
Place doesn't look like much from the outside, but the food and service are excellent. I had a shrimp burrito and my husband had the carnitas plate. Both were huge plates and very tasty. 
  Margarita was so-so.  Would come again.

data.title: A Pleasant Experience
data.text: Arrived late in the evening and was seated just before closing, Staff was very accommodating however and I enjoyed a very pleasant and tasty meal.  Food was delicious

data.title: Good Mexican Restaurant
data.text: Our meals were tasty and the portions plentiful.  I would definitely eat here again.  It is a bonus that is on the property of the motel where we stayed.

data.title: Great Burritos!
data.text: We were coming in after a long drive. The staff was very nice and welcoming despite it was almost cloning time. They have a huge selection of Mexican style food at a really great price. Would recommend to a friend!

data.title: The best Mexican dining
data.text: Very good enchiladas, different varies. Awesome rice and beans.  Tried pork fajitas, and close to being my favorite!! Nice friendly family and always helpful and the best service around. Absolutely 5 stars.

data.title: located next to Thunderbird Lodge
data.text: We stayed at the Thunderbird Lodge and saw this neat Mexican family style restaurant on-site.  Rather than searching and driving to another restaurant, we decided to try it out.  We were surprised at the authentic Mexican dinner we got which was very tasty and filling.  The interior was decorated in traditional Mexican style which reminded me of restaurants in Mexico.  The food came out quickly and was very delicious.  The service was fast and the staff very attentive.  We will definitely go back the next time we drive through Redding.  It is located a short distance off of I-5.

data.title: Redding visit - good Mexican Food
data.text: After our walk around Shasta Dam, we drove out to Redding to grab a quick lunch before we head out to Humbolt State area. The waitress who greeted us was very nice and friendly. The menu has many good options. This place serves breakfast all day. I was really happy to see that as I felt like having eggs. My son had the fish burrito and he loved it and wanted to order a second one to go. We stopped him because we couldn't finish our Carne Asada burrito, and so he took that for the road instead. They give you a good amount of food and chip and salsa. We didn't order any alcoholic drinks, but they have a bar. If I come by Redding again, I would definitely come here.

data.title: Excellent service, good Mexican food, very good Margaritas
data.text: Walked over from the Thunderbird Lodge after a very long day's drive.  Hubby got a beer and I got a nice raspberry Margarita.  The servings were large and the service was attentive.  Good end to a long day.

data.title: Great Mexican Food
data.text: S place has very authentic foods from Mexico. The staff are friendly and you can have the fresh made tortilla chips and salsa you can eat. The prices are at place to get you appetite filled. I recommend any of the burritos.

data.title: Quick dinner after an evening walk
data.text: Have been here before and remembered the food being pretty good. However we were immediately put off by the bad service we had. The waiter acted as if we were an inconvenience to him. It was not busy nor was it late so don't understand why we received the service we did. We both needed a second drink but was never asked if we wanted one. We probably won't be returning to this restaurant.

data.title: By far the best
data.text: My husband and I were staying in the Thunderbird Lodge. We asked the owner where the best Mexican restaurant was that we could walk to. He recommended LA Cabana just on the other side of the parking lot. Great pick. Best mole, best chicken enchiladas, best everything we have ever eaten. Very nice family-owned restaurant. We will stop in every time we get a chance.

data.title: Love this place
data.text: I have been going to this restaurant for many years.  The food is great and the service is excellent.

data.title: The best mexican food in Redding
data.text: I have visited La Cabana atleast 2 times a month for the past 6 months. Every time I order something different. This is good quality food, never have had a bad dish yet. The people are always friendly and the service is surpurb. Family owned and operated. The enchiladas and beans are my favorite. Located right in the downtown area, easy to miss,as the traffic can distract you and you can drive past it. Worth the trip! Excellent salsa and hot corn chips brought to your table, with free refills! Quickly became my favorite place for lunch and dinner!

data.title: good, authentic food
data.text: Best refried pinto beans I've ever eaten -- just a cut above.  Good horchata too.  The pickled carrots were VERY hot -- beware.

data.title: Okay
data.text: Food was okay  had the burrito everyone liked the rice it was great they do have nacho cheese its spicy  And the service was great

data.title: Our Favorite Mexican Place
data.text: My family LOVES La Cabana!  The food is always fresh and delicious.  Prices are very reasonable and the service is great.  We visit Redding once a month for business and were referred here by the hotel Manager (Ramada Inn) where we stay when in town.  Highly recommended!

data.title: Yummy!
data.text:
Very nice place.I had the torta.and it was nicely done and HUGE! Lots of veggies in it. I had the steak one. I forgot what is called but it's very tasty.  They also give chips and salsa with my order 
The Michaels drink is made on site. I think I spelled it right.  Rice milk drink that is delicious and perfect with that food. 
When I come back I will revisit for sure
